name: tf-vc-checkout
description: Checks out files and adds them to Pending changes.
author: Jesse Houwing

inputs.name: ItemSpec
inputs.label: Files to checkout
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify one or more paths, separated by `;` or newline. While wildcards (`?`, `*`) are supported, they're not the same as the minimatch patterns used by other build task and do **not** support the recursive wildcard `**`.

Example: `$/MyTeamproject/Main/AssemblyInfo.cs`

inputs.helpMarkdown: Controls whether you'll be adding in just the current folder/file (None), one level below the selected path (One Level) or all levels below the selected path (Full).
inputs.label: Recursion
inputs.name: Recursion

instanceNameFormat: Checking out files from source control
